answerText: isolobal analogy (or isolobal principle)[10] Frontier orbitals include this orbital and the LUMO. This is the most energetic orbital inhabited by electrons.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Editors 1 | 19 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this relation describing molecules like P4 and C4H4 that have frontier orbitals with similar symmetry, energy, shape, and number of electrons.
